DataElement.preferredName: Neurocognitive Assessment Consent Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that are related to the patient's consent of neurological assessments, as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Neurocognitive Assessment Consent Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the ability to think and reason. This includes the ability to concentrate, remember things, process information, learn, speak, and understand._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Permission to do something._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the ability to think and reason. This includes the ability to concentrate, remember things, process information, learn, speak, and understand.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Having to do with the ability to think and reason. This includes the ability to concentrate, remember things, process information, learn, speak, and understand.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Property.preferredDefinition: Permission to do something.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 1/4/21 TL transferred from TEST to CCTG and released. 10/16/17 tt CE7.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient is able (i.e. suffici
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is able (i.e. sufficiently fluent) and willing to complete the neurocognitive assessments in either English or French without assistance from family or companions.
